Subject: Client certificate stored on smart card using CAC reader - How to bypass the DPI
Description: We are using Client certificate stored on smart card using CAC reader to access the https://public.cyber.mil/ but whenever DPI is enabled, we couldn't access the URL as Endpoint won't allow us to use our certificate which is stored in smart card.
Solution_Comment__c:
The issue was resolved with our recommendation of DPI configuration changes.
Case is closed.
